title: Clinical Services
description: The Nairobi Hospital offers a wide range of clinical services to meet the healthcare needs of our patients.
dentaldescription: The Nairobi Hospital Dental Clinic provides comprehensive dental care, including preventive, restorative, and cosmetic services, ensuring optimal oral health for all patients.
pharmacydescription: The Nairobi Hospital Pharmacy provides a wide range of medications and health products, ensuring safe and effective treatment options for all patients.
gynaecologydescription: The Nairobi Hospital’s Gynaecology Clinic offers specialized care for women’s reproductive health, including screenings, treatments, and family planning with compassion.
antenataldescription: The Nairobi Hospital’s Antenatal Clinic provides comprehensive care for expectant mothers, including screenings, counseling, and support throughout pregnancy.
